requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6500 veya AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 Ti Or AMD Radeon RX 460
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: No internet connection required
  • Additional Notes: Low-spec systems may experience reduced performance.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or Intel Core i5-10400
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 SUPER or equivalent
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: No internet connection required
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for smooth performance on mid to high-end systems.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8.1 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 850 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: I don't have a reliable way to test this, admitidly. Although, these are the minimum requirements for RPGMaker MZ, which is the software this game is made in. My reasoning is that if a PC can run that, it should have no problem running Cubenen Gardens: Befriend.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX-8350 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 (8 GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (8 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: High-resolution photo textures and realistic lighting can push VRAM usage to ~8 GB. Running on an SSD significantly reduces texture pop-in and load-in stutter. Windows x64 only at launch; Linux/macOS support coming soon.
